page.title: 18HOBBIES & GAMES
page.content: When I get home I play with my Lego sets. I enjoy playing with them because you can make lots of different models. My favourite model is the police station. Lego comes in different groups for different ages, starting with Duplo for 0 to 4 years. The most advanced Lego is Technical Lego for 10 to 14 years. But I enjoy technical sets which are meant for older ages, even though my dad has to do some of it. In the playground I play Sticky Glue with my friends. The person who is it tries to get another person. If another person gets touched they stand with their arms out wide and a person has to go under their arms to make them free again.
